# Transparency Token 

## Issued Token 

### Protected Header

~~~ json
{
  "alg": "ES384",
  "b64": false,
  "crit": [
    "b64"
  ],
  "kid": "https://issuer.example/issuers/4fd94f63-4e8d-4ba0-8b08-496c6087acf0#FBn2Z_fxzOe3TLFNnJP7GRVpHz40yRPPJyn6MYgdKVQ",
  "typ": "application/cool+jose",
  "cty": "text/plain; charset=utf-8",
  "jwt_claims": {
    "cnf": {
      "kid": "https://subject.example/subjects/6320cb92-fffe-4538-8c82-2ad3b6e7fbf8#JHix8cQe5VrFNUu8eunFcvfyCWsA4nbol9TbphGa5zo"
    },
    "iat": 1700763222,
    "_sd_hash_alg": "sha-256",
    "iss": "https://issuer.example/issuers/4fd94f63-4e8d-4ba0-8b08-496c6087acf0",
    "sub": "https://subject.example/subjects/6320cb92-fffe-4538-8c82-2ad3b6e7fbf8"
  }
}
~~~

### Unprotected Header

~~~ json
{
  "counter_signatures": [
    "..UFjqr7OBkbHZ5slDS8Jk3-bEXWkqgi3g4IE1Q-U4NIECQQ1Vx922DeAZTaqRes-T81eojecmxU3wrI9QOEw-FI8jN5WaNoRJ3GtLcAJ_7xall-zcYrclzRYGLbvLz2mg"
  ]
}
~~~

### JSON

~~~ text
{
  "protected": "",
  "unprotected": {
    "counter_signatures": [
      "..UFjqr7OBkbHZ5slDS8Jk3-bEXWkqgi3g4IE1Q-U4NIECQQ1Vx922DeAZTaqRes-T81eojecmxU3wrI9QOEw-FI8jN5WaNoRJ3GtLcAJ_7xall-zcYrclzRYGLbvLz2mg"
    ]
  },
  "payload": null,
  "signature": "IP5KSMUeiTAMJjC-m_cMM2fYgF90XuyD7SoKYDINabmjDZlvIEdpcUYavjaFNIYwz6yfK7w78NfAyaNKCuxdFfj453lALVq-fSZxpejQ3DrusSYPdHVDQLnbRQOFucVS"
}
~~~
